Hotel - Class in hotelchain
Representation of a hotel.

hotelchain - package hotelchain
 
HotelChain - Class in hotelchain
Main class of the HotelChain application.
HotelChain(String) - Constructor for class hotelchain.HotelChain
Constructs an instance of a HotelChain and creates instances of its guest registration and reservation manager systems.

Represents the main menu of the HoteChain text-based user interface.
HotelChainTextInterface(HotelChain) - Constructor for class hotelchain.HotelChainTextInterface
Constructs an instance of a textual HotelChain user interface.
